name: Rapid Decay
text:
Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor: The grave robbers arrived the day after the burial. They were a day too late.

name: Rapid Fire
text:
Cast Rapid Fire only before blockers are declared.
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. If it doesn't have rampage, that creature gains rampage 2 until end of turn. (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Rapid Hybridization
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

editions.flavor:

name: Rare-B-Gone

editions.flavor: The only rare you'll ever need. Okay, not really.

name: Rashida Scalebane
text: {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking Dragon. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its power.

editions.flavor: It is not by the blood of dragons that Rashida measures victories, but by the sum of children who no longer wake from nightmares of scales and fire.

name: Rashka the Slayer
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

editions.flavor:
"Rarely be the prey so haughty as to hunt the hunter."
—Baron Sengir

name: Rashmi, Eternities Crafter
text: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card with converted mana cost less than that spell's, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't cast the revealed card, put it into your hand.

name: Rasputin Dreamweaver
text:
Rasputin Dreamweaver enters the battlefield with seven dream counters on it.
Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Add {C} to your mana pool.
Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rasputin this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Rasputin started the turn untapped, put a dream counter on it.
Rasputin can't have more than seven dream counters on it.

name: Ratcatcher
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Ratchet Bomb
text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb.
